name: CrowdVolt
headline: Bid/ask style ticket exchange powered by automated order fulfillment
description:
CrowdVolt is a two-sided, bid-ask style live event marketplace similar to StockX. We’ve created the only secondary ticket exchange that supports fully automated order fulfillment.

Contact us at founders@crowdvolt.com

founders.name: Josh Karol, Founder
founders.description: I'm originally from Connecticut and am a Co-Founder and the CTO at CrowdVolt. I previously was a Software Engineer at Millennium. In my free time I like to go skiing and fishing.

generated_description:
**CrowdVolt: Revolutionizing Ticket Sales**

CrowdVolt is a new player in the ticket exchange arena, launching in 2024 and proudly part of Y Combinator's W24 batch. Positioned in New York, this agile startup comprises a dedicated team of four, working tirelessly to reshape how we buy and sell tickets for live events. Imagine a platform that combines the best of stock market mechanics with the thrill of live entertainment—this is what CrowdVolt aims to achieve. 

Their mission? To create a bid/ask style ticket exchange that capitalizes on automated order fulfillment. This means buyers and sellers can engage in straightforward transactions without the typical hassle of manual processes. It's a seamless marketplace reminiscent of StockX, but tailored specifically for the vibrant world of live events, concerts, and festivals.

When you step into CrowdVolt's digital space, you’re greeted with the promise of easy, secure, and hassle-free ticket transactions. They focus heavily on community engagement, harnessing the power of user-generated reviews and ratings to build trust and reliability.

CrowdVolt is particularly catering to those excited about EDM and rave culture, but their vision encompasses a diverse range of events, from sports to concerts across major cities like New York and Miami. The platform boasts features like trending events and straightforward browsing, making event discovery quick and engaging.

Led by Jared Friedman as their group partner, CrowdVolt embodies a fresh wave of innovation in the ticketing sector. If you’re interested in learning more or even joining the fray, you can reach them at [founders@crowdvolt.com](mailto:founders@crowdvolt.com) or visit their website at [crowdvolt.com](https://crowdvolt.com).

In this era where experiences are paramount, CrowdVolt isn't just facilitating ticket sales; they're building a community around them. So, if you're ready for your next great event, CrowdVolt might just be the marketplace you've been searching for.
